name: Twatter
description:
Twatter - TeamUp Jam 2015 Entry!

Game developed by @st1ka and @sayomgwtf in about 20 hours to participate in TeamUp Jam for 2015. Supporting GameDev.Life efforts, we learned Inkscape, Construct2 and the magical world of Itch.io publishing.

Twatter is a silly and short prototype, only 5 levels available for now with multiple screens and derp. Currently there may or may not be bugs, but uploading for now to participate in #TeamUpJam.

-----

April 17th Update: All 10 levels added!
